subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fernando Verdasco defeated top-seeded Nicolas Almagro, 6-7 (2), 7-6 (2), 6-3, to set up an all-Spanish final against Marcel Granollers at the Swiss Open in Gstaad.
snippet: Fernando Verdasco defeated top-seeded Nicolas Almagro, 6-7 (2), 7-6 (2), 6-3, to set up an all-Spanish final against Marcel Granollers at the Swiss Open in Gstaad.
